T04sanss02u:1: evam eṣām ātmabhāvâdīnām utsṛṣṭānām api rakṣā kāryā |
T04sanss02u:10: evaṃrūpayā śāriputra hitâiṣikatayā samanvāgato bodhisatvo jīvitahetor api pāpaṃ karma na karotîti
T04sanss02u:12: śakaṭam iva bhārôdvahanârthaṃ kevalaṃ dharmabuddhinā vāḍhavyam
T04sanss02u:24: kalyāṇamitrapraticchannâbhyudgatā bhavanti lokāt kalyāṇamitraparyupāsitā bodhisatvâsaṃpramoṣacāriṇo bhavanti sarvabodhisatvacaryāsu |
T04sanss02u:28: tasmāt tarhi kulaputrâivaṃ manasikārāt pratipraśrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇy upasaṃ-
T04sanss02u:50: kalyāṇamitrânuśāsanīpratipannasya kulaputra bodhisatvasya buddhā bhagavanto 'bhirāddhacittā bhavanti |
T04sanss02u:54: atâivâryasudhanaḥ sāradhvajasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasâbhivandyânekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkrṭya sāradhvajaṃ bhikṣum avalokya praṇipatya punaḥ punar avalokayan niyataṃ praṇipatan
T04sanss02u:56: namasyann avanaman manasi kurvan cintayan bhāvayan paribhāvayann udānam udānayan hākkāraṃ kurvan |
T04sanss02u:57: guṇān abhimukhīkurvan nigamayann atra sann anusmaran dṛḍhīkurvann avijahan manasâgamayann upanibadhnan praṇidhiṃ samavasaran darśanam abhilaṣan svaranimittam udgṛhṇan yāvat tasyântikāt prakrāntaḥ |
T04sanss02u:58: tathā kalyāṇamitrâgataṃ sarvajñatāṃ saṃpaśyann aśrumukho rudan yāvan meghasya dramitasyântikāt prakrāntaḥ ||
T04sanss02u:60: iha śāriputra bodhisatvo dharmakāmatayā nâsti tal loke
T04sanss02u:63: nâsti tat kāyôpasthānaṃ yan na karoti |
T04sanss02u:70: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduṣkhadaurmanasyacchedāyâiṣa dharmaḥ saṃvartatae iti ratnacittam utpādya bhaiṣajyacittam
T04sanss02u:75: sacet punar gṛhapate pāṭhasvâdhyāyârthiko bodhisatvaḥ kasyacid antikāc catuṣpādikāṃ gāthāṃ śṛṇuyād uddiśed vôdgṛhṇīyād
T04sanss02u:76: dānaśīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāsaṃprayuktāṃ bodhisatvasaṃbhārôpacayaṃ vā tena tasminn ācārye dharmagauravaṃ karaṇīyaṃ yāvadbhir nāmapadavyañjana ...
T04sanss02u:79: yadi tāvatâivaṃ kalpāṃs tasyâcāryasyôpasthānaparicaryāṃ kuryād aśaṭhatayā
T04sanss02u:81: adyâpi gṛhapate na pratipūritam ācāryasyâcāryagauravaṃ bhavati |
T04sanss02u:84: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravam utpādayitavyaṃ |
T04sanss02u:88: dhisatvo mahāsatvâivaṃrūpair guṇair gauravamanasikārair gacchann anupūrveṇânyatamanagaram anuprāptas |
T04sanss02u:90: yan nv aham imam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīyânena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya satkāraṃ kuryāṃ |
T04sanss02u:91: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamâtmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni vikrītāni punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre 'parimāṇāni yāni mayā
T04sanss02u:92: kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānam anubhūtāni na punar evaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśâivaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā satvānāṃ satkārāya ||
T04sanss02u:93: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'ntarāyaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdam udīrayām āsa ghoṣam anuśrāvayām
T04sanss02u:96: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃs tathā samupasthāpayām āsa yathā taṃ ghoṣaṃ nâśrauṣuḥ
T04sanss02u:97: yadâtmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate tadâikântaṃ gatvā prārodīd aśrūṇi ca prāvarttayad evaṃ câvadad
T04sanss02u:98: aho vatâsmākaṃ durlabhā lābhā ye vayam ātmabhāvasyâpi kretāraṃ na labhāmahe |
T04sanss02u:101: vānām indro māṇavakarūpeṇa yāvat sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat |
T04sanss02u:105: ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayêmam ātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ karttukāmaḥ so 'ham asya krāyakaṃ na labhe |
T04sanss02u:107: atha khalu sa māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam etad avocat |
T04sanss02u:108: na mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam api tu khalu punaḥ pitur me yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ |
T04sanss02u:109: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena kṛtyaṃ lohitena câsthimajjayā ca |
T04sanss02u:112: lābhā me sulabdhāḥ pariniṣpannaṃ câtmānaṃ jāne
T04sanss02u:114: yan mayâtmanaḥ krāyako labdho hṛdaysya rudhirasya câsthimajjāyāś ca ||
T04sanss02u:115: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittas taṃ māṇavakam etad avocat |
T04sanss02u:116: dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena te itâtmabhāvād arthaḥ |
T04sanss02u:117: yāvat sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ nisrāvayati sma
T04sanss02u:118: dakṣiṇaṃ côruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ ca kṛtvâsthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlam
T04sanss02u:121: atha khalv anyatarā śreṣṭhidārikôpariprāsādatalagatâdrākṣīt sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvaṃ yāvat sā śreṣṭhidārikā
T04sanss02u:123: kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputrâivaṃrūpām ātmanaḥ kāraṇāṃ kārayāsîti |
T04sanss02u:124: yāvat sā dārikā pūjāprayojanaṃ śrutvā punar āha |
T04sanss02u:127: s te kulaputra tato guṇajātir niṣpatsyate |
T04sanss02u:129: sa dārike kulaputro mama prajñāpāramitām upāyakauśalyaṃ côpadekṣayti |
T04sanss02u:130: tatra vayaṃ śikṣiṣyāmas tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasatvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ |
T04sanss02u:132: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisatvam etad avocat |
T04sanss02u:134: yāvad udārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ |
T04sanss02u:136: gaṅgānadīvālikôpamān api kalpān evam ātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ |
T04sanss02u:137: tathôdārāḥ praṇītāś câmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrttitāḥ |
T04sanss02u:138: api tu khalu kulaputra yena yena kṛtyaṃ tat te dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇiṃ vā muktāṃ vā vaiḍūryaṃ vā yāvad yena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisatvaṃ satkariṣyasi |
T04sanss02u:139: yāvad vistareṇa tayā dārikayā pañcaśataparivārayā sārddhaṃ tasya dharmodgatasya saṃkramaṇaṃ kartavyaṃ ||
T04sanss02u:140: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ utthāyâsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat |
T04sanss02u:142: sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sapta varṣāṇi na kāmavitarkam utpādayām āsa |
T04sanss02u:143: na vyāpādavitarkaṃ na vihiṃsāvitarkam utpādayām āsa |
T04sanss02u:147: kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyutthāsyati |
T04sanss02u:148: yad vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmâsanaṃ prajñāpayiṣyāmo yatrâsau kulaputro niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siktaṃ saṃmṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpâbhikīrṇaṃ iti cintayām āsa ||
T04sanss02u:149: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikā pramukhāṇi pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasyânuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyām evêryāpathābhyāṃ kālam atināmayām āsuḥ ||
T04sanss02u:150: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvo divyaṃ nirghoṣam aśrauṣīd itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'smāt
T04sanss02u:154: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvâttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayām āsa sārddhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ pañcabhir dārikāśatair dharmâsanaṃ prajñapayām āsa saptaratnamayaṃ |
T04sanss02u:155: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaś ca |
T04sanss02u:156: na côdakaṃ samantāt paryeṣamāṇo 'pi labhate yena taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ siñced |
T04sanss02u:157: yathâpi nāma māreṇa pāpīyasā tat sarvam udakam antardhāpitaṃ apy eva
T04sanss02u:158: nāmâsyôdakam alabhamānasya cittaṃ duṣkhitaṃ syād daurmanasyaṃ ca bhavec cittasya vânyathātvaṃ bhaved yenâsya
T04sanss02u:159: kuśalamūlântardhānaṃ bhaven na vā bhrājeran kuśalamūlāni |
T04sanss02u:160: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyâitad abhūt |
T04sanss02u:161: yan nv aham ātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvêmaṃ pradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyaṃ |
T04sanss02u:164: mā rajodhātur ito dharmodgatasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya kāye nipatatu |
T04sanss02u:166: varaṃ khalu punar mamâyaṃ kāyâivaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu na ca niḥsāmarthyakriyayā |
T04sanss02u:169: ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punar aparimāṇe saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni |
T04sanss02u:170: yadi punar bhidyante kāmam evaṃrūpeṣv iva dharmasthāneṣu bhidyantāṃ ||
T04sanss02u:171: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisatvo mahāsatvêti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ
T04sanss02u:173: ntato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvam asiñcat |
T04sanss02u:175: na ca sadāprarudito bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyânyathātvam abhūt |
T04sanss02u:178: kalyāṇamitraṃ bhikṣavo bodhisatvena mahāsatvena yāvajjīvaṃ na parityaktavyam api jīvitahetor iti ||
T04sanss02u:179: tad evaṃ kalyāṇamitrânutsargād ātmabhāvâdīnāṃ rakṣâdikaṃ kāryaṃ ||
T04sanss02u:180: sūtrāṇāṃ ca sadêkṣaṇād bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni hi prāyaḥ sūtreṣv eva dṛśyante |
T04sanss02u:181: teṣu teṣu sūtrânteṣu bodhisatvasamudācārā bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni prajñaptānîti vacanāt |
T04sanss02u:182: tasmāt tadanīkṣaṇe mā bhūd āpattim āpannasyâpy ajñānād aviratir iti sadā sūtradarśanāyâdaraḥ kāryaḥ |
T04sanss02u:183: tad anena kalyāṇamitrânutsargeṇa sūtrântadarśanena ca sarvaḥ
T04sanss02u:186: yābhir akṣaraniruktibhiḥ so 'nabhilāpyo dharmaḥ sūcyate tāsām
T04sanss02u:189: punar aparaṃ kulaputra ye te dharmabhāṇakâiṣām evaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrântānāṃ deśayitāraḥ pratipattisārāś ca teṣām api dharmabhāṇakānāṃ yat sevanaṃ bhajanaṃ paryupāsanam utthānam upasthānaṃ gauravaṃ citrīkāraḥ śuśrūṣârakṣā parigrahaś cīvarapiṇḍapātraśayanâsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāradānaṃ sādhukāradānaṃ svāmy-ārakṣā
T04sanss02u:198: adharme dharmavādināṃ ca pudgalānāṃ saha dharmeṇa nigrahaḥ |
T04sanss02u:200: punar aparaṃ kulaputrâpratihatasantānasya sarvasatvapramokṣabuddher nirāmiṣacittasya parebhyo dharmadānam ayam api saddharmaparigrahaḥ |
T04sanss02u:201: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yo dharmaśravaṇahetuko vā dharmadeśanāhetuko vântaśâikakramavyatihāro 'ntaśâikôcchvāsapraśvāso vā |
T04sanss02u:205: tasya yā nivāraṇā parirakṣâikâgrībhāvo damaḥ śamôpaśamo vinayo 'yam ucyate saddharmaparigrahaḥ
T04sanss02u:207: punar aparaṃ kulaputra yena dharmeṇa yo 'dharmaḥ pravartate tasya
T04sanss02u:213: na śuddhir na vṛddhis [[DOUBT]] tataś ca so 'pi na bodhisatvêty avaśyakāryaḥ saddharmaparigrahaḥ
T04sanss02u:216: bodhisatvapraṇidhānāni tāny ekasmin mahāpraṇidhāne upanikṣiptāny antargatāny anupratiṣṭhāni yad uta saddharmaparigrahe |
T04sanss02u:219: syād yathâpi nāma devi mahābalavato 'pi puruṣasyâlpo 'pi
T04sanss02u:222: evam eva devi mārasya pāpīyasaḥ parītto 'pi saddharmaparigraho-
T04sanss02u:224: vedhanīyo bhavati śokâvahaḥ paridevakaraś ca bhavati |
T04sanss02u:225: nâhaṃ devi anyam ekam api dharmaṃ kuśalaṃ samanupaśyāmi mārasya pāpīyasâivaṃ vedhanīyaṃ śokâvahaṃ paridevakaraṃ ca |
T04sanss02u:230: syād yathâpi nāma devi sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvān kulaparvatān abhibhavann abhirocate ca samabhirocate côccatvena
T04sanss02u:232: evam eva devi mahāyānikasya kāyajīvitanirapekṣasya na ca gṛhītacittasya saddharmaparigraho navayānasaṃprasthitānām api kāyajīvitasâpekṣāṇāṃ mahāyānikānāṃ sarvān kuśalān dharmān abhibhavatîty ādi ||
T04sanss02u:234: parigṛhīto bhavatī jinebhir devebhi nāgebhi ca kinnarebhiḥ |
T04sanss02u:237: sa śūnyakṣetreṣu na jātu jāyate sarvatra jātau ca jinaṃ sa paśyati |
T04sanss02u:238: dṛṣṭvā ca tasmiṃl labhate prasādaṃ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanss02u:239: jātismaro bhavati mahâtmadharmā pravrajyalābhī bhavate punaḥ punaḥ |
T04sanss02u:242: lābhī ca bhotī vidudhāraṇīye na naśyate kalpaśatebhi yacchubham |
T04sanss02u:246: śakro 'tha brahmā tatha lokapāl-o manuṣyarājā bhuvi cakravarttī |
T04sanss02u:247: sukhena saukhyena sa bodhi budhyate saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanss02u:251: na tasya tṛptiṃ labhi prekṣamāṇāḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām ||
T04sanss02u:252: na tasya saṃmuhyati bodhi cittaṃ na côddhuraḥ pāramitā carīṣu |
T04sanss02u:253: asaṃgṛhītaḥ kuśalaḥ śatebhiḥ saddharmadhāritva tathāgatānām iti ||
